p: Molecular analyses of the 778 mosquitoes revealed 13 YFV positives, all of which were Haemagogus janthinomys ( Figure 2). Of the positives, 11 were collected on the same day (January 29, 2018) and in the same sampling area (Area 4). The other two positive mosquitoes were collected in December 2017 in two different areas (Areas 2 and 3). The infection rates for the sampled areas are shown in Table 3 and the Ct value of the samples are available in Table S2 in the supplementary material.
